a parts breakdown technique using list structureslist structured parts breakdown is proposedand discussed implementation facts are presented on operating program using these techniques.cacm june 1964brian w j.ca640617 jb march 9 1978 9:09 pm1050 4 10501050 4 10501050 4 10501050 4 10501050 4 10501102 4 10501226 4 10501393 4 10501549 4 10501549 4 10501935 4 10501936 4 1050378 4 10502017 4 10502023 4 10502032 4 10502257 4 10502360 4 10502451 4 10502452 4 1050441 4 10502723 4 10502882 4 10503008 4 10503112 4 1050627 4 1050731 4 1050731 4 1050758 4 1050793 4 1050798 4 1050106 5 10501050 5 10501050 5 10501050 5 1050209 5 1050367 5 1050627 5 1050849 5 1050
